title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 21 October 2013 - XWiki
content:
<Denis> has joined #xwiki  
05:51 <Denis> has quit  
06:39 <UCC> has joined #xwiki  
06:44 <UCC> has quit  
08:06 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:06 <vmassol> has quit  
08:08 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:20 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:34 <kstuart> has quit  
08:39 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:49 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
08:52 <msmeria> has quit  
08:53 <kstuart> has joined #xwiki  
08:54 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
09:15 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:23 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:32 <vmassol> good morning  
09:37 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:45 <msmeria1> has quit  
09:49 <vmassol> fixing build for activeinstalls  
09:58 <vmassol> build fixed  
10:03 <vmassol> FTR I'm finishing http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XCOMMONS-333 this morning  
10:04 <vmassol> (been a long time I wanted to do it and I started this weekend)  
10:04 <vmassol> I've finished commons, rendering and I'm halfway through platform  
10:56 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
11:55 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
12:02 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
13:06 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
13:10 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
13:12 <msmeria> has quit  
13:59 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
14:01 <polx> has quit  
14:01 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
15:04 <sburjan`> has quit  
15:09 <tmortagne> has quit  
15:20 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
15:28 <GuillaumeF> has joined #xwiki  
15:29 <GuillaumeF> Hi, don't you want to add a message to explain that manager version has been dropped? in http://manager.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Download  
15:30 <vmassol> GuillaumeF: yes gdelhumeau need to do this asap  
15:30 <vmassol> (I think he forgot)  
15:30 <vmassol> :)  
15:31 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: could you take care of updating manager.xwiki.org?  
15:31 <vmassol> note: we still need manager.xwiki.org to be there for users who need old versions  
15:31 <vmassol> but there should be a message on all pages  
15:31 <gdelhumeau> OK, I'll do it  
15:31 <vmassol> it's easy just use the new extenson point  
15:31 <gdelhumeau> all pages?  
15:31 <vmassol> yep  
15:32 <vmassol> it's the easiest  
15:32 <gdelhumeau> yes, indeed  
15:32 <vmassol> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ExtensionPoint/AfterHeaderUIX  
15:32 <gdelhumeau> thx  
15:38 <gdelhumeau> I can't add a UIExtensionClass on xwiki.org  
15:38 <vmassol> I did it a few days ago  
15:38 <vmassol> permission issue?  
15:38 <gdelhumeau> I guess  
15:38 <vmassol> what happens?  
15:38 <gdelhumeau> I only have a few available classes in the object editor  
15:39 <vmassol> ah didn't recall that we do checks on objects?  
15:40 <vmassol> can you try to edit that page?  
15:42 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: I can't  
15:42 <gdelhumeau> You are not allowed to view this document or perform this action.  
15:42 <vmassol> ah you're not admin?  
15:42 <gdelhumeau> probably not ;)  
15:42 <vmassol> I protected the admin space to admins  
15:42 <vmassol> changing that  
15:43 <vmassol> can you try again?  
15:43 <gdelhumeau> Still permission deny  
15:44 <gdelhumeau> it's ok now  
15:44 <vmassol> yes sure, I've removed all perms  
15:44 <gdelhumeau> I can edit the warning page, but I still don't see UIExtensionClass in the object editor  
15:44 <vmassol> you can't edit the existing object?  
15:45 <gdelhumeau> oh yes I can  
15:46 <vmassol> ok rights should be ok now for you  
15:47 <gdelhumeau> ok  
15:48 <gdelhumeau> should I remove XEM from the too menu too?  
16:05 <UCC> has joined #xwiki  
16:09 <gdelhumeau> the build is broken  
16:12 <tmortagne> yep  
16:12 <tmortagne> "Failed while enforcing RequireUpperBoundDeps"  
16:12 <tmortagne> conflict between "org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-rendering-macro-script:5.3-20131021.092244-33" and "org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-rendering-macro-script:5.3-SNAPSHOT"...  
16:14 <tmortagne> both triggered by oldcore  
16:14 <tmortagne> the new enforcer rule does not seems to work great  
16:14 <tmortagne> fixing the one about org.jboss.logging:jboss-logging  
16:14 <vmassol> hmm checking  
16:15 <vmassol> I ran the build for the full code though  
16:16 <tmortagne> do we have a slf4j bridge for jboss-logging ?  
16:16 <tmortagne> I guess not  
16:16 <vmassol> I don't think we have  
16:16 <vmassol> maybe it falls back automatically?  
16:16 <vmassol> I don't know much about jboss logging though  
16:17 <vmassol> rebuilding platform-rendering  
16:17 <vmassol> works fine here  
16:17 <tmortagne> AFAIK it's more of a wrapper to easily switch from one system to another than a real logger system but maybe it changed  
16:17 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: does it fail locally for you?  
16:18 <tmortagne> vmassol: do you build with -U ?  
16:18 <vmassol> nope  
16:18 <vmassol> ah maybe because thomas changed deps this morning  
16:18 <vmassol> I had built before  
16:18 <vmassol> I've seen several deps changed just after  
16:19 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: yes  
16:20 <vmassol> with -U I get another error  
16:20 <vmassol> test error:  
16:20 <vmassol> Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: javax.validation.ParameterNameProvider  
16:20 <tmortagne> I reverted an upgrade, probably what cause the error about jboss-logging but my concern is more for the mix up between snapshpot and timestanped versions  
16:21 <tmortagne> make sure to pull before building  
16:21 <vmassol> indeed  
16:24 <vmassol> tmortagne: with -U I get only one failure  
16:24 <vmassol> but on "XWiki Platform - Rendering - Macro - Cache "  
16:24 <vmassol> the only error is about jboss logging  
16:25 <vmassol> https://gist.github.com/vmassol/7084727  
16:25 <vmassol> Idon't get the timestamp issue  
16:25 <tmortagne> vmassol: it does not seems to be all the time  
16:26 <tmortagne> previous jenkins build does not have the error for example  
16:27 <tmortagne> also jenkins fail on oldcore, maybe cache macro is built before oldcore  
16:27 <vmassol> I have no clue for the timestamp issue ATM  
16:29 <vmassol> going to install the Github stats app on dev.xwiki.org  
16:29 <vmassol> (fyi)  
16:29 <vmassol> for using on http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/HallOfFame  
16:30 <tmortagne> vmassol: looks like you forgot to release it on jira  
16:30 <vmassol> indeed thanks  
16:30 <vmassol> I'll do it  
16:45 <vmassol> you can now see stats in real time on http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/HallOfFame :)  
16:46 <vmassol> I hope this will not put too much load on the server ;) (if so I'll put a cache macro around it)  
16:46 <vmassol> actually I 'll do that now  
17:14 <sburjan> has quit
